name: Up For Desserts
description:
A short adventure about climbing a tower to reach a sweet prize.

Controls
Arrow keys: Move around
Z: Jump / Confirm
X: Action
A/S: Cycle forwards/backwards through characters

Credits
Team Name: Squishy Genso

Ferdy - Project Manager/Programmer/Artist/Story
SlascoplerdSorasu - Artist/Music/SFX/Design
CYCzen - Artist (Backgrounds)
Neg, Crestelysio, and wallofpuppies - Playtesting and Feedback

Submitted for Wholesome Game Jam 2022
